chapter.text: Iqeob ed i medden uqeiii nnsen, u nitni stehzan, ur d rzin
Ur ten d ippas usmekti amaynut, s$uo Mass nnsen, mebla ma ppuraren, mara s sslen
Ur d rzin wulawen nnsen. Ppemcawaoen wid idensen, s tuffra: "d acu t wagi, siwa amdan am kunwi? Day a pvefoem sseur, kunwi tepwalim
Inna: "Mass iw Ieoa timenna deg igenni, di tmurt. Neppa Issel, Issen
Maca, nnan: "d taffa n tirga. Xaii! Isnulfa t id. Xaii! Neppa d amedyaz. Aha san, ad a$ d iawi assekni, akken id ippuceggaa i imezwura
Ur tumin, uqbel nnsen, yal temdint Nesqucc, day ad amnen nitni
Ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, siwa irgazen, iwumi Nweeea. Steqsit imawlan usmekti, ma ur teeoim
Ur ten Nerri d tifekkiwin ur ntepp lqut. Ur wekkoen
Sinna, Neiief deg wayen i sen Naahed, u Nsellek iten akked wid i £ ihwan. Nen$a imcumen
Ih, Nessers awen ed Tazmamt, degs asmekti nnwen. Day ur tefhimem ara
Aceal n temdinin idensen ay Neoea! Nexleq, deffir sent, agdud nniven
Mi eussen i lwaaoan nne£, atnan la regwlen, segs
Ur regwlet ara, u$alet ar wayen is testasrem, ar ixxamen nnwen. Amar fellawen asteqsi
Nnan: "a yamxix nne$, nella, s tidep, d imednas
Ur tfukk ti$oi yagi nnsen, armi ten Nerra d aqecqac urhif
Ur Nexliq ara, i wurar nne£, igenni, tamurt, akked wayen illan garasen
Lemmer day Neb$i lhawiyya, yili Nebbwi p id, s $uone£, maday Naana
Xaii! Nekkat tikerkas s tidep. Tneqq itent. Neqvent. A tawa$it nnwen, ilmend n wayen d teggarem
IneS kra illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Wid illan $uoeS, ur sme$woen ara iman nnsen, $ef uaabed iS. Ur aaggun
Ppanzen iv akked wass, ur seissifen
Ne$ ddmen d, si tmurt, ioebbiten id ipparan ar ddunit
Lemmer llin degsen ioebbiten, war Oebbi, war ccekk, ad fesden. Gedha s Oebbi, Mass n usgeld, seg wayen id ggaren
Ur fellaS asteqsi $ef wayen Ixeddem. Nitni, fellasen asteqsi
Ne$ day ddmen ioebbiten, war Neppa? Ini: "Awit ed atebbet nnwen". Ayagi d asmekti i wid illan yidi, d asmekti i wid illan, uqbel i. Maca, tegwti segsen, ur ssinen tidep. D$a zzin akin
Ur d Nuzen amazan, uqbel ik, siwa ma Nweeea yas ar: "ur illi oebbi siwa Nek, ihi aabdet iyI
Nnan: "Isaa Uenin aqcic". Gedha s yiS! Xaii! D imdanen imaazuzen
Ur S d zeggwiren deg wawal, xedmen s lameo iS
Ieoa i illan zdat sen, akked wayen illan deffir sen. Ur ccafaan, siwa $ef win Iouva. U nitni, si lxuf iS, peadaren
Win, segsen, id innan: "nek d oebbi, war Neppa", a t Nqeiii s Loahennama. Akka ay Nepqeiii imednas
Ne$ wid ijehlen ur walan ara tamurt akked igenwan llan mlalen? Nessemfaoaq iten, Nga s waman kra n wayen idren. Ihi, day ur ppamnen ara
Nerra di tmurt idurar, iwakken ur tepeerrik ara yissen. Nerra, degsen, tiza d iberdan, amar ad pwanhun
Nerra igenni d ssqef innestaoen, u nitni ooan issekniyen nne£
D Neppa i Ixelqen iv akked wass, iiij akked waggur, yal wa iteddu deg ubrid is
Ur Nefka ara, uqbel ik, tameddurt n lebda i umdan. Day kecc a ppemmtev, nitni ad wekkoen
Yal amdan ad ijeooeb tameppant. Nepjeooib ikwen s cceoo, akked lxio. D ahewwel. £uone£ tu$alin nnwen
Mara k id walin wid ijehlen, pmmaaliken kan fellak: "d wagi id ikkaten deg ioebbiten nnwen"? Nitni nekoen asmekti n Uenin
Ipwaxleq umdan si leemeq. Ad awen d Ssenaate$ issekniyen iW, ihi, ur iyI $eubet
Qqaren: "melmi lemaahda yagi, ma tessawalem tidep
Wid ijehlen, a lemmer ad eoen tagwnip ideg ur d tekksen udmawen nnsen, ne$ iarar nnsen, si tmes! Nitni ur pwasellken
Xaii! A ten id ias, deqzalla, a ten iwwet ba$a, ur zmiren a t rren, ne$ ad gganin
Ni$ ttahan $ef imazanen, uqbel ik! Ayen i$ef mmaalken, izzi d $ef wid, segsen, i ittahan
Ini: "anwa ara kwen ifukken, iv akked wass, seg Uenin"? Maca, ooan asmekti n Mass nnsen
Ne$ saan ioebbiten ara ten ifukken, war Nekwni? Ur zmiren ad sellken iman nnsen, ur sain imaiwnen mgal a£
Xaii! Nestaser i wigi akked imezwura nnsen, ar tewser nnsen. Day ur walan ara, Neppas ed ar tmurt, Nessenqas si leryaf is? Day d Nitni ara irebeen
Ini: "la kwen nedoe$ kan, s uweeei". Ur sellen iaeeugen i unabi ma ppunedoen
Ma ieuza ten uuuvu uaaqeb n Mass ik, war ccekk, a d inin: "a ssexv nne$! Ih, nella d imednas
A n Nessers lmizanat iuewben, ass n tnekra. Ur ipwadnes umdan s wacemma. Xas d aaqqa ucceryad, a t id Nawi. Nesteqnaa yisne£ i uqeiii
Ni$ Nefka i Musa akked Haoun, afraz, akked tafat d usmekti, i wid ipeezziben
Wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen, ur T walan, u pearaben $ef yimir
Wagi d asmekti ioqan, id Nessader. Day a t tagwim kunwi
Ni$ Nefka, zik, nnhaya s i Iboahim? Nella Nessen it
Mi inna i baba s akked ugdud is: "d acu tent taancurin agi, i la tepkabarem
Nnan d: "Nufa d imezwura nne$ la tent aabden
Inna: "ihi, tellam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen, di ttelfan n uuee
Nnan: "tusiv a$ d, s tidep, ne$ kecc seg wid ippuraren
Inna: "xaii. Mass nnwen d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, id Ixleq. Nek, seg inagan n waya
S Oebbi, ard ad andi$ i taancuoin nnwen, mara teiiixxoem
Isseftutes itent, siwa tameqwoant degsent, amar a d u$alen $uoes
Nnan: "anwa i igan akka i ioebbiten nne$? Neppa, war ccekk, d amednus
Nnan: "nesla i ilemei, itent id iudren, isem is Iboahim
Nnan: "awit ep id, zdat wallen n medden, amar ad ilin d inagan
Nnan: "day d kecc i igan akka, i ioebbiten nne$, a Iboahim
Inna: "xaii, i igan akka, d ameqwoan nnsen agi. Steqsit pen, ma pmeslayen
Endekwalen d. Nnan: "ih, d kunwi ay d imednas
Sinna, bran i iqweooa nnsen: "ni$ wigi, teeoiv, ur pmeslayen ara
Inna: "day taabdem, war Oebbi, ayen ur kwen inefaan, ur kwen iiiuooun, s wacemma
Tfuh i kunwi, akked wayen taabdem, war Oebbi! Day ur tefhimem ara
Nnan: "sseo$et ep, u sellket ioebbiten nnwen, ma taazmem
Nenna: "a times, ili d tasmuvi u d talwit, i Iboahim
Undin as p. Nerra ten d imexsuoen mavi
Nsellek it, akked Lui, ar tmurt i Neoqa i imavalen
Nefka yas Iseaq, Nerna yas Yaaqub. I sin, Nerra ten d wid imaanen
Nerra ten d imvebboen, nehhun s lameo nne£. Nweeea yasen igiten ilhan, taeallit, azekki. Llan d wid i £ iaabden
I Lut, Nefka uuwab, tamusni. Nsellek it si temdint i illan txeddem tucmitin. Llan, s tidep, d agdud n dir, d laaouo
Nesskecm it deg ueunu nne£. Neppa, ih, seg wid imaanen
I Nue, zik, mi inaao. Njaweb as ed. Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, si lefqaa abarar
Neneeeel it mgal agdud i iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Llan, s tidep, d agdud n dir. Ne$ves iten meooa
I Dawed akked Sliman, mi eudden $ef yiger, ideg ksant wulli n medden. Nella d Inagan ueuddu nnsen
Nessfehm as p i Sliman. I sin, Nefka uuwab, tamusni. Neeppem i idurar akked igvav ad sbuccaen Dawed. D ayen Newqem
Nesseefv as, ad awen iunaa iceiiiven, ara iearben fellawen si tiytiwin. Day a ppesnemmrem
I Sliman, avu n tarikt, ipuuvu s lameo is, $er tmurt i Neoqa. Nezga Neeo yal cci
Ger ccwaien, wa i$evves as, wa iqubel cce$l nniven. Nella d imearaben nnsen
I Yub, mi inuj $eo Mass is: "nek pwa$e$. Kecc, Tifev akw wid ipeunun
Njaweb as ed. Nekkes as it ivuooen; Nerra yas d tawacult is, akw, yides, tin i p icban. D aeunu s$uone£, d asmekti i iaabaden
Ismaail, Idris, Dulkifl, akken ma llan, d iueboiyen
Nesskecm iten deg ueunu nne£. Nitni, s tidep, seg wid imaanen
I Dannun, mi ioue s wurrif. I$il ur Nesai ara adabu fellas. Inaao, di tellis: "ur illi oebbi siwa Kecc. Gedha s yiseK! Nek lli$ si imednas
Njaweb as ed. Naateq it si eemik. Akka ay Naateq lmumnin
I Zakaria, mi inuj $uo Mass is: "a Mass iw! Ur iyi Ippaooa ara d amengur. Kecc, Tifev akw iweooaten
Njaweb as ed. Nefka yas Yaeia, Nesseela yas tameiiut is. Nitni, s tidep, izga izwar lxio nnsen. Pnujun $uone£, s tugwdi d usirem. Unzen a£
Ar tin i iqqimen zeddiget, Nuuv si ooue nne£. Nerra p, neppat akked mmi s, d assekni i imavalen
Lois agi nnwen, war ccek, d lois yiwen. Nek d Mass nnwen, ihi aabdet iyI
Gezmen lameo nnsen garasen. £uone£, akw, ara d u$alen
Win ixeddmen ayen ilhan u irna iumen, ur ipoueu laatab is. Ih, Nekwni Nepparu fellas
Ipwagdel asen a d u$alen $eo temdint i Nesqucc
alamma serreen d i Iaouo d Maouo. Nitni, si yal ti$ilt, a d azzlen
Tqeob ed lemaahda n tidep. Atan iqquo yieoi n wid ijehlen: "a tawa$it nne$! Ni$ nella ne$fel $ef waya. U, aaer, nella d imednas
Kunwi, s tidep, akked wayen taabden, war Oebbi, d is$aoen n Loahennama. £ures, kunwi, teppeddum
Lemmer llin widak d ioebbiten, ur p keccmen. Akw, ad wekkoen degs
I nitni, degs, zzhir. Nitni, degs, ur sellen
Ma d wid iwumi izwar ssaad, s$uone£, widak, segs, ad baaden
Ur sellen i uuut is. Ad wekkoen deg wayen cihwant teowiein nnsen
Ur ten i$webbel lweec abarar. A ten magrent lmalayek: "assa, d ass nnwen, i wen ippuwaaaden
Ass ideg ara Nesnefvas igenni am tweoqep n tira, akken Nebda axlaq amezwaru, ad as Nales. D lemaahda fellane£. Akka, ih, ara Nexdem
Ni$ Nura deg Ihellilen, deffir usmekti: "ara iweoten tamurt, d imdanen iW imaanen
Deg wayagi, war ccekk, d asali i ugdud iaabbaden
Ur k id Nuzen, siwa d aeunu i imavalen
Ini: "iyi d ippuweeean, siwa: Oebbi nnwen d Oebbi Yiwen kan. Kunwi ma d imvuaen
Ma wexxoen, ini: "aaggne$ awen, akken ma tellam; ur eoi$ ma iqoeb, ne$ ibaad, ayen i wen ippuwaaaden
Neppa, s tidep, Issen awal d iff$en, Issen ayen tessusmem
Ur eoi$ ma, ayagi, ahat d ahewwel nnwen, u d zzhu n tallit kan
Inna: "a Mass iw! Eekem s tidep. Mass nne$, Aenin, i nepper d Amaiwen, mgal ayen teppandim
